content: mcgrawhill connect is a subscriptionbased learning service accessible online through your personal computer or tablet choose this option if your instructor will require connect to be used in the course your subscription to connect includes the following smartbook  an adaptive digital version of the course textbook that personalizes your reading experience based on how well you are learning the content access to your instructors homework assignments quizzes syllabus notes reminders and other important files for the course progress dashboards that quickly show how you are performing on your assignments and tips for improvement the option to purchase for a small fee a print version of the book this binderready looseleaf version includes free shippingcomplete system requirements to use connect can be found here httpwwwmheducationcomhigheredplatformsconnecttrainingsupportstudentshtml
